Text:
Thanks.

I get sick once in a while, but the real secret is: eat healthy; exercise; enough sleep; no tobacco/alcohol; and (sadly) good genes!

Downloading and will seed gratefully.

My psychic powers are telling me the secrets involve exercise, eating right, drinking lots of water and getting enough good quality sleep. Honorable mention likely given to cleanliness and maybe even meditation. :D 

I don't mean to sound like a rhymes with witch-- it's just that the more of this I read, the more similar the good ones sound. Still, one of these days it will click and I'll actually just do it.
